abstract: WikiLeaks’ founder may have already spilled the beans on which bank the organization plans to target with its next document dump.
snippet: WikiLeaks’ founder may have already spilled the beans on which bank the organization plans to target with its next document dump.
lead_paragraph: 3:33 p.m. | Updated with Bank of America statement

headline.main: WikiLeaks’ Next Target: Bank of America?

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
